name: EasyDonation
author: Paul Bain

sections.installation:
1. First, download the plugin, upload it to your plugin directory and activate it in WordPress
  2. Head over to PayPal and generate the code for your button
  3. In WordPress go to Manage then the sub-menu EasyDonation
  4. Paste your code into the box and save

To insert the donation button into content, one simple tag is all you need!
Insert [donation] anywhere in your WordPress content and away you go!
sections.description:
EasyDonation allows WordPress users to easily embed a PayPal donation button with one tag.

Support

For support vist forums.ejump.co.uk

short_description: EasyDonation allows Wordpress users to easily embed a PayPal donation button with one tag.
